name: Saturday Morning TV Fix It Bash
name_original: Saturday Morning TV Fix It Bash
description:
(Be patient - it takes a little while to load)

It's Saturday morning, you have a bowl of cereal at hand and you need to get your fix of cartoons. 

All that stands in your way is a TV with a whole load of problems. 

Grab the aerial, turn the switch, and hit the TV in order to get all your Saturday morning favourites  to display properly.

Click anywhere in the window to start the game.  Depending on the fault(s) with the TV you will have to click in the correct place to fix it. 

If you'd like to contact me please do so on twitter @dr_d_king
